verses.roman:
madhyāhna kariyā āilā devatā-mandire
nija-gaṇa praveśi' kapāṭa dila bahir-dvāre

synonyms: madhyāhna kariyā—performing bathing, etc; āilā—came back; devatā-mandire—to the temple of the Lord; nija-gaṇa praveśi'-allowing His own men; kapāṭa dila—shut; bahir-dvāre—the outside door.
translation: After finishing Their baths, They returned at noon to the temple. Admitting His own men, Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu closed the outside door.
